pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recursive Non-Additive Emulator for Multi-Fidelity Data // Performs RNA emulation and active learning proposed by Heo and Sung (2023+) arXiv:2309.11772 for multi-fidelity computer experiments. The RNA emulator is particularly useful when the simulations with different fidelity level are nonlinearly correlated. The hyperparameters in the model are estimated by maximum likelihood estimation.
